name: Hahn Air
description: German scheduled and executive charter airline with headquarters in Dreieich, founded in 1994. Originally an intra-German airline based at Frankfurt-Hahn Airport, Hahn Air has evolved into a leading provider of distribution services for other airlines and ticketing solutions for travel agencies. Since 1999, the company connects over 350 partner airlines and 100,000 travel agencies across 190 markets, providing insolvency-safe HR-169 ticketing solutions through its IATA prefix code 169. Hahn Air operates a fleet of business jets and offers comprehensive travel distribution services including GDS integration, BSP participation, and Securtix insolvency protection.
